name: 曾恕銘　Office Hours
objective: 課程主要為介紹人工智慧概念和基本原理，學習 DNN/CNN/LSTM 的神經網路架構和學習方法，並舉資通訊技術應用實例說明，進而在雲端或非雲端平台實作人工智慧。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction with computer tool
2.　　DNN with labs and case study radio resource allocation
3.　　Learning method with labs
4.　　CNN with labs
5.　　RNN LSTM with lab and case study 5G polar code decoding (optional)
6.　　Analogizers: K-means, kNN, SVM
7.　　Self-attention (transformer) with case study scene boundary detection
8.　　Bayesians (Baysian statistics optional)
9.　　Symbolists: Decision Tree
10.　　Autodecoder/ neural style transfer (optional)
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation 20%
Lab report 40%
Project 40%
materials:
Textbook
Handouts

References:
Tan, Steinbach, Karpatne, Kumar, Introduction to Data Mining, 2e, 2019
Mendenhall and Sincich, Statistics for engineering and the sciences, 5/e, Prentice Hall.
鄭羽熙，人工智慧關鍵技術初探，2019.8.26
Jinwoo Shin, Deep Learning for Optimization, Communication and Networks, The East Asian School of Information Theory & Communication (EASITC), August 6-10, 2018 
https://www-users.cs.umn.edu/~kumar001/dmbook/index.php#item4
http://www.willamette.edu/~gorr/classes/cs449/intro.html
https://speech.ee.ntu.edu.tw/~hylee/ml/2021-spring.html
